posts.post_content: He beats bolas in a fight, offensive or defensive, he makes creatures more resilient to burn so they can at least attack (even [grizzly bears](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=grizzly bears) doesn't die to [lightning bolt](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=lightning bolt)) He makes walls better, and Dosan Decks love him (if you can afford the convoluted 4 color deck.)
